subject: Re: Frank's Box on Paranormal State Tonight
author: Regan
full_text:
That was quick. ;)

Quote:
This is clearly a mistake, if you could provide a link so we could 
remedy this as soon as possible, it would be greatly appreciated. We in 
PRS are well aware that Frank Sumption is the original owner and 
inventor of the Franks Box. Any links would be greatly appreciated!

Thanks! 
--------------------
Topher Michael Young
PLR Director/FIR Investigator
